title: Lasgna

ingredients.name: spaghetti sauce (more is better than less)
ricotta or pot cheese or cottage cheese

instructions: PREPARE PASTA9 noodles = 3 per row.Combine water and salt in large kettle. Float oil on surface of water; bring to boil. Slowly add noodles, a few at a time; cook 15 minutes. Drain; rinse with cold water.Arrange on toweling to drain.

PREPARE SAUCEsauté onion and garlic over low heat 5 minutes and add beef in large skillet until brown.Add oil to skillet. Add spaghetti sauce and seasonings. Cook over low heat 20 minutes or until thick.
Taste sauce. If bland add:1 tsp apple cider vinegar1 tsp sugar 1/2 tsp salt

ASSEMBLYLightly grease 13 × 9 × 2-inch baking dish.Ladle approximately ¾ cup sauce into pan. Top with ⅓ of noodles. Mix egg with cheese and Dot with ½ the ricotta and ½ the mozzarella. Add layer of sauce and ⅓ of noodles and remaining ricotta and mozzarella
COOKPreheat oven to 350, cover with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes.Remove the foil and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes
